Articles.Content:
Can someone confirm if the Airbrakes now have a maximum temperature of 2400k both core and skin?

Any other parts have a change in stat?

Yes, the AIRBRAKES are 2400/2400 now.

There were not many changes, but the main ones were to the Xenon and Monoprop tanks. Instead of the old random placeholder values, they now have storage capacities and masses in line with their size.

Edited March 14, 2018 by bewing
